keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.UCS

Class Parameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.UCS.Parameters

  • public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object

    In this class there are all the classifier parameters of UCS.

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Albert Orriols (La Salle University Ramón Lull, Barcelona) 28/03/2004, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle University Ramón Lull, Barcelona) 03/12/2008

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parameters

        public Parameters()
        Constructs a Parameters Object.

      • Parameters

        public Parameters(int tStamp,
                  double size,
                  double gen)

        It creates an instance of Parameters. It is used in covering

        Parameters:
        tStamp - is the current time of the system.
        size - is the action set size
        gen - is the generality of the classifier.

      • Parameters

        public Parameters(Parameters p1,
                  Parameters p2,
                  int tStamp)

        It creates a new parameter object making a crossover between the parents parametres.

        Parameters:
        p1 - is the object that contain the parameters for the first parent.
        p2 - is the object that contain the parameters for the second parent.
        tStamp - is the current time stamp.

      • Parameters

        public Parameters(Parameters p,
                  int tStamp)

        It creates a new parameter object copying the parameters from a parent

        Parameters:
        p - is the origin of the copy
        tStamp - is the current time stamp

    • Method Detail

      • updateParameters

        public void updateParameters(double microClInC,
                             double classOfRule,
                             double classOfExample)

        Updates the parameters of a classifier (reinforcement component)

        Parameters:
        microClInC - is the size of the correct set activated in this iteration
        classOfRule - is the class predicted by the rule
        classOfExample - is the class of the input example

      • updateFitness

        public void updateFitness(double kSum,
                          double k)

        Updates the fitness of a classifier

        Parameters:
        kSum - is the sum of all accuracies.
        k - is the accuracy of the classifier.

      • getAccuracy

        public double getAccuracy()

        Returns the accuracy of the classifier.

        Returns:
        a double with the accuracy

      • getCSize

        public double getCSize()

        Returns the estimated correct set size.

        Returns:
        an integer with the estimated action set size.

      • getExperience

        public int getExperience()

        Returns the experience of the classifier.

        Returns:

        Returns the numerosity of the classifier.

        Returns:
        an integer with the numerosity

        public int getTime()

        Returns the time of the classifier.

        Returns:

      • setTime

        public void setTime(int sTime)

        Sets the time stamp for this classifier.

        Parameters:
        sTime - is the time stamp

      • setExperience

        public void setExperience(int expCl)

        Sets the experience of the classifier.

        Parameters:

      • setNumerosity

        public void setNumerosity(int num)

        Sets the numerosity of the classifier

        Parameters:
        num - is the numerosity of the classifier.

      • setGenerality

        public void setGenerality(double general)
        Sets the generality of the classifier.
        Parameters:
        general - is the generality that has to be set to the classifier.

      • increaseNumerosity

        public void increaseNumerosity(int num)
        Increases the numerosity of the classifier.
        Parameters:
        num - amount to increase

      • deletionVote

        public double deletionVote(double avFitness)
        Returns the probability of a classifier to be deleted.
        Parameters:
        avFitness - is the average fitness of the set.
        Returns:
        a double with the probability of being deleted.

      • couldSubsume

        public boolean couldSubsume()

        Indicates if the classifier can subsume. The classifier has to be sufficiently accurate and sufficiently experienced to subsume another classifier.

        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the classifier can subsume.

      • print

        public void print(java.io.PrintWriter fout)

        Prints the classifier to the specified file.

        Parameters:
        fout - is the file output where the parameters have to be printed.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the classifier statistics to the standard output.
